::DrillBit::

First someone distracts their command structure by talking over comm or
something. Then small teams attack differant point of their base,
causeing their defense to spread at minimal capacity. Those teams also
keep moving. Attack quickly and move to the next point of attack. While
this is happaning another team, most likely us Commanders, find a way
into the base and extract DarkFate. Also this will have to be done
quickly because we are not suited for water. I still say the best way in
is from me drilling up from the elow the ocean floor and into the base.
The only problem is we need to know a little bit about that bases
design."
He looked to DarkFate with a look of 'What do you think?'.
